about_the_game:
Live the night!


Open your own nightclub and turn it into the city’s #1 joint. Choose your character and step into an entrancing world of clubbing presented from a first-person perspective. Run your joint at night and prepare for another night during the day. The competition never sleeps, so do everything to wow your patrons and make them come back.

It’s your bar.

Shape its vibe. From choosing the music to decorating the place to hiring the right bouncers, bartenders and dancers, you always have a free hand. Make business acquaintances, stock up the place and step in when things get rough between your patrons.

In this world, every NPC has a purpose.

Talk with them. Get their feedback. Read between the lines and discover how to improve the place to make your patrons happy. Storylines will form. Character arcs will develop. You will be the driving force behind it.



Tough night? Take a break from being a boss. From casting your dancers to mixing your drinks, there’s always something fun to be done.

Features:

  • Manage a nightclub and expand into a chain.
  • Design the interior and run the business from the floor.
  • Hire diverse staff and participate in dancer casting.
  • Run your errands by exploring a part of the city.
  • Use the day-night cycle to prepare for the evenings.
  • Interact with NPCs with their own stories, moods and expectations.
  • Have fun with minigames testing your reflexes and wits.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content Violence, Alcohol and drugs references.

name: Nightclub Manager: Violet Vibe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5-2500 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon R7 260X series card or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Become a nightclub mogul in an immersive first-person club manager simulator. Open your venue: decorate it, hire bouncers and dancers, choose the music. Interact with your patrons, mix drinks, and react when things get rough!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
